verbs.description: What if the Trump presidency [ARGM-ADV: only] [V: proves] [ARG1: to be the bridge to even darker conspiracies] [ARGM-TMP: when it comes to whoever becomes president next] ?
What if [ARG1: the Trump presidency] only proves to [V: be] [ARG2: the bridge to even darker conspiracies] when it comes to whoever becomes president next ?
What if the Trump presidency only proves to be the bridge to even darker conspiracies [ARGM-TMP: when] it [V: comes] [ARG1: to whoever becomes president next] ?
What if the Trump presidency only proves to be the bridge to even darker conspiracies when it comes to [ARG1: whoever] [V: becomes] [ARG2: president] [ARGM-TMP: next] ?
